name: Verify Get Chatbot API when the env_id is invalid or missing -- @1.1

steps.name: Given FireBase_User sends GET request to fetch chatbots with env_id "asdf"
When FireBase_the user receives the response
Then FireBase_error code should be 400 for bad request error
And FireBase_response shows error message "Bad Request"
And FireBase_the message should be "Invalid input:"

fullName: Verify Get Chatbot API: Verify Get Chatbot API when the env_id is invalid or missing
